Enclosing class:
ExitTrappingSecurityManager
public static class ExitTrappingSecurityManager.SystemExitException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

An exception that gets returned when someone called system.exit but the exit was blocked.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a new runtime exception with null as its detail message.

          The status code that was used with this exception

Constructor Detail

ExitTrappingSecurityManager.SystemExitException

public ExitTrappingSecurityManager.SystemExitException(int status)
Constructs a new runtime exception with null as its detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to Throwable.initCause(java.lang.Throwable).

Parameters:
status - exit code that was used for this exit request
